name: Space Defender (nicki1999)
description:
This is my 2D Shooter Project (Space Defender).

Modifications :

1) Changed preview logo

2) Visualized main menu and added instruction to it

3) Added both environmental elements to both LVL 1 and LVL 2

4) The score value of StraightChasing2 changed to 30 in level 1 which is less range of chasing

5) Added multiple attackers in level one and configured their setting

6) Changed the cursor pointer

Created By Nicki Najafi
